players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob seems suspicious to me."
You: "Charlie, I'm not suspicious. I'm just a villager trying to figure out what happened to Alice."
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and found out he's one of them."
You: "I'm not the mafioso. I'm just a villager trying to figure out what happened to Alice."
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and found out he's one of them."
Charlie: "Bob, I'm not sure if you're the mafioso or not. But Diana's words are making me think twice about your innocence."
